text: usane kaha, "tumane usako maan liya, isase pahale ki main tumhen anumati deta. nishchay hee vah tum sabaka pramukh hai, jisane tumako jaadoo sikhaaya hai. achchha, sheeghr hee tumhen maaloom hua jaata hai! main tumhaare haath aur paanv vipareet dishaon se katava doonga aur tum sabhee ko soolee par chadha doonga.
